message.name: ERR_HEARING_PHONE_CONTACT_FV_STATUSNOTSCHEDULED
message.locale: Phone contact numbers can only be added for a scheduled hearing.

message.name: ERR_HEARING_PHONE_CONTACT_FV_STARTDATENOTSPECIFIED
message.locale: Phone contact start date must be specified.

message.name: ERR_HEARING_PHONE_CONTACT_FV_ENDDATENOTSPECIFIED
message.locale: Phone contact end date must be specified.

message.name: ERR_HEARING_PHONE_CONTACT_FV_COUNTRYCODENOTSPECIFIED
message.locale: Phone contact country code must be specified.

message.name: ERR_HEARING_PHONE_CONTACT_FV_AREACODENOTSPECIFIED
message.locale: Phone contact area code must be specified.

message.name: ERR_HEARING_PHONE_CONTACT_FV_PHONENUMBERNOTSPECIFIED
message.locale: Phone contact number must be specified.

message.name: ERR_HEARING_PHONE_CONTACT_FV_PHONENUMBERINVALIDSTARTDATE
message.locale: Phone contact start date '%1d' is later than the end date '%2d'.

message.name: ERR_APPEAL_FV_CASEPARTICIPANTMISSING
message.locale: The case participant role must exist for the appeal case.

message.name: ERR_PHONE_CONTACT_EXISTS
message.locale: This phone contact already exists for the hearing.

message.name: ERR_HEARING_PHONE_CONTACT_ALREADY_CANCELED
message.locale: This phone contact has already been canceled.
This phone contact has already been cancelled.

message.name: ERR_HEARING_PHONE_CONTACT_CANCELED
message.locale: This phone contact cannot be modified as it has been canceled.
This phone contact cannot be modified as it has been cancelled.
